DOC.brief_summary: Ethanol Locks Adjunct Treatment Central Venous Line Infections Purpose To evaluate effectiveness 70 % ethanol lock solution use adjunct therapy antibiotic treat central venous line infection Study Design Randomized Controlled Trial Study Protocol Only patient meet inclusion criterion exclusion criterion eligible participate study . Once identify , sign informed consent obtain patient 's guardian patient himself/herself depend age . Patients randomize 2 group : Group 1 - patient receive ethanol lock therapy Group 2- patient receive placebo therapy form heparin lock solution . Outcome Measures Treatment success define by- - Clearance infection document negative blood culture day 6 ( one day complete lock treatment ) - Preservation line 30 day post treatment ( day 35 study ) , document chart review CIS telephone interview ensure growth blood culture infection Treatment failure define by- - Clinical worsening treatment - Removal line due persistent infection sepsis - Recurrence infection pathogen within 30 day
